info.name: alternation psychedelic
info.description: Variation of iridule's Psychedelic Fractal Test.

renderpass.code:
#define mainImage(O,I)                    \
    vec2 R = iResolution.xy,              \
         p = ( I+I - R ) / R.y;           \
    for (int c = 0; c < 3; c++)           \
        for (float t = iTime+.1*float(c),s = 1.; s > .5; s *= .8 ) \
            p = abs(p) / dot(p, p) - s,   \
            O[c] += s * .064 / length( p *= mat2(sin( t*.5 + vec4(0,21,11,0))) )
renderpass.name: Image
